item.title: For ‘No Tax on Tips,’ the I.R.S. Gets Intimate
item.description: The Trump administration wants to exclude earnings from “pornographic activity” from a new tax break for tips. Will the I.R.S. know it when it sees it...

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Demands Netflix Drop 50 Cent Series, Citing New Footage
item.description: The mogul’s lawyers told the streaming service to withdraw a documentary because it was produced by his rival and uses footage they say was “illicitly...

item.title: Trump Becomes the Wild Card in Razor-Thin Honduras Election
item.description: President Trump warned that if his favored candidate didn’t win, the United States would “not be throwing good money after bad” at the country.

item.title: Floods in Indonesia, Sri Lanka, Thailand and Vietnam Have Killed Over 1,200. Here’s What to Know.
item.description: Unusually destructive storms have killed more than 1,200 people across the region and displaced millions in South and Southeast Asia.

item.title: TSA Imposes $45 Fee for Travelers Without REAL ID Starting February 2026
item.description: As of February, passengers without the government-approved identity card will be required to pay for alternative screening at U.S. airports.
